item.title: Singtel collaborates with Airtel to launch hi!India plans
item.description:
Singtel and Airtel have partnered to provide Singtel prepaid mobile customers with access to high-quality calls to India through the Airtel Talk app. This service was previously only available to credit card holders. Now, Singtel prepaid customers can utilize Airtel Talk by purchasing hi!India plans using their prepaid credits. Calls made through Airtel Talk are transmitted via standard IDD lines, resulting in enhanced call clarity. Hi!India plans start at S$5 for 100 minutes (S$0...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-collaborates-with-airtel-to-launch-hi-india-plans/
